src.evaluation
==============

.. py:module:: src.evaluation

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   evaluation
   -----------
   This package contains the (power and coherence) evaluation functions to
   compare simulated EEG data against real EEG data.

----------

   :maxdepth: 1
